It didnt match the picture. I was missing a strap and the collar piece. I still use it but its just an okay piece. the straps were so long i had to pin them inside the sleeve. i got a few compliements at the rave when it reflected.

评论概述: Very flimsy and there’s no quality
评论详情: The fabric and straps are very flimsy and the straps don’t even stay in place like I thought they would. So if you move your arm the straps just fall out/off of the sleeve. I would’ve returned it but I’m simply too lazy nor care enough as it didn’t cost that much but I don’t recommend anyone buying this product. I took a chance thinking that people were overly picky about things but I was definitely wrong this time with this purchase
Cheap material, doesn't look like the photo
I am 5'8" and this fits me perfectly! It is now a main addition to my techwear aesthetic!

I will say that the material is quite thin but it’s sturdy enough and breathable which I love. Took me a moment to figure out how to get it on but now that I’ve done it a few times it’s super easy. Currently using it as part of my pro wrestling entrance gear.  I’m going to be adding a few things to personalize it but this is a great base. Definitely worth the buy .

I’m used to buying things that are a shade off my preference , but this is ridiculous! It’s barely even colored at all! I took a picture of this next to some neon green fishnets for comparison. What a joke!
Mine appears to be missing the neck piece but looks fine, otherwise. A bit awkward to try to wear without it.. would love it if I could have that sent..
collar broke after wearing it for the second time.
Got this to use for a Shego costume, super cute and would have been perfect but didn’t fit my frame. I had to tighten it as much as I could and it was still big and then didn’t hold.
Looked awesome and stayed on without a problem during a Steve Aoki concert. Still reflective, hasn't peeled , highly reflective and comfortable even if you have bigger upper arms; recommend.

Bought it to create a DIY Shego Halloween costume. Much better quality and fit than I was expecting! Very adjustable, chocker is removable and sleeve was the perfect length (I know you can’t see it much in the photo though). 5’5” 145lbs
Wore it on Halloween as part of my shego (Kim possible) outfit! Will definitely be incorporating it into my closet

评论概述: I'd feel better if it was 10$ on temu
评论详情: If the buckle slides make sure you know how to thread a buckle like these... I thought I'd have to pull one from all of my costuming supplies but it just turns out in manufacturing the buckle isn't always right side out. It arrived as what I expected, the material is light and there's probably a grand total of dollars worth of plastic and polyester. But it fit the style of the outfit I was putting together, and I couldn't easily find it somewhere where the price is more appropriate for fast fashion.  It can also be worn on either arm as most asymmetrical tops have only a right sleeve.
Good material absolutely love it

It looks like was advertised, but the material was alot smoother than expected. Very much feels more like a cosplay or costume piece. Fit was a little short  on my arm, but not by much. Strap that goes across your chest did not come put together and fit loosly on the clip, so it had an issue staying at whatever fit you tried to put it at.
to complicated

i bought this for afest this july, and was very happy that it looks exactly like the photo! i’m planning on cosplaying as kurapika from hxh but him wearing techwear! i’m also going to be wearing this to my future concerts, so hopefully ateez or stray kids announces another tour for the next year! the only issue i have is the buckle on the side for both sides is a bit loose, however i’m sure i’ll just need to tighten it a bit better!
I purchased this for the Agust D concert... When I opened it I noticed that I was missing the choker collar part of the outfit. I would have given a higher rating if I had received all the pieces.
This went perfectly with my outfit for the Steve Aoki concert. I got so many compliments! IG: Kristinlee00
Comfy. It took time to figure out the buckle strap and how to webb it right. But its all good!!

It was perfect for the ATEEZ concert!  It was a bit big, but not uncomfortably so.  The choker part was too large, but it's removable so it was fine.  I got lots of compliments on it.  Also made of very good material.
Looked like a snack
the color is a strong slime green, it’s not very vibrant, not nearly as vibrant as the image. it’s very dull and a lil ugly. fits great and comfortably though!

It looks great when it’s on, but I bought it as part of my dance ensemble. It doesn’t stay put when dancing. I had to tie it down in two places to keep it from going up to my neck. It’s comfortable enough and the material is breathable. Aesthetically it looks great, but maybe not practical for dancing in. Wish it was a little more covering for us ladies with larger breasts.
This was a cute piece but the color was not as expected when ordering.

评论概述: Not made of good material and missing parts
评论详情: This product isn’t good if you’re looking for good quality material clothing. The material is super thin and unless you have a larger bust it won’t fit right.
I switched arms even though it seems a bit more of a right armer but its definitely still cute regardless as a add on top
Got for a show and is a great addition to a basic outfit!
Accurate description all pieces were there a good Compliment to an outfit

It’s a little tight on bigger arms but it’ll still work for what I need. The buckle came unthreaded but once I figured out how to do it right it fastens fine and doesn’t slip. It’s perfect for my Shego costume but definitely feels like one of those “you get what you paid for” deals. Also, it’s definitely not neon green. Overall, it’s okay and will serve its purpose for the couple nights it needs to for Halloween.
Not too hard to put together and looks super cool
Straps were a little confusing but I quickly figured it out. The only downside is that the extra straps just hang down which I wasn’t a fan of, but it wasn’t a big deal.

评论概述: Cheaply made, but i guess it’ll do?!
评论详情: Definitely not as nice as it appears in the photo. The fabric is super thin and the straps don’t really want to stay in place. For the price, I would expect a better version of what arrived. I guess I will use it because it is cute but I’m sure you can find better.

It is a very cheap and thin material for 30 dollars. Did not come with the collar and The strap needs to be held in place with safety pins as it is too small for the clasp. It is still cute though and fits well.
Cheap fabric doesn't fit like picture
It's great for concert. I wore it to the Monsta X concert in June
Really good quality and good material. Using it for a Halloween costume and think it’ll work great

评论概述: Not the quality in the photo

Looks cool, comfortable, adjustable.
I love this thing! It fits just as expected and really adds to some of my outfits! Would but again
The material feels so cheap and it’s soooo small. It said one size but on the tag, it said medium.
It did not come with the collar shown in the photo. I don’t know if it’s just mine or this is common from this seller, but other than that it fits well and I like it! Just wish it had the collar.

I’m a 210/5’6”/size XL in shirts, and this thing fits very well around my bust and on my upper arms. Very comfortable, and the strap is VERY long if you have a more “generous” chest. Highly recommend!

The strap is too loose and won’t stay adjusted if you tighten it. And there’s a piece that is suppose to go around your neck but I didn’t receive it so I can’t wear it properly. Probably gonna return. It’s a bit expensive for what it’s worth
The picture given of course looks to be a better quality, however still very wearable and functions how it supposed to

Really fun for my look, it matched perfectly. It’s designed a little strange, there are two straps that dangle off the sleeve for no reason, and the chest adjustment strap seems like it was just designed wrong. I unstrapped it a re-did it so it was adjusted more securely and it was fine after that.
I love this top! Completed my look for Beyond!

评论概述: Fun piece to wear at a festival
评论详情: Kept my arm warm lol but I really loved this sleeve.. a lot of people liked my outfit. Cute for festivals
I’m too shy to even war this outside w/o thinking I’m dressing too extra lol. But this is great if anyone needs a little inspo for their outfit ideas lol.

Pretty decent green color not super neon but it fits my arm well and I have a thicker arm. I’m 5’5” and 220lbs so my arms usually don’t fit into Amazon clothing but I was pleasantly surprised at how stretchy the fabric was
It looks like the picture. I would say if you have bigger arms this will be right on you and I wouldn’t recommend. Also this fabric definitely makes your arm sweaty
It didn’t come with the collar. Which not only makes it difficult to stay in place, but not nearly as cute as a silhouette.
Love the fit not made for a person with big arms also the color is not neon green at all

评论概述: If you're very petite you may have issues
评论详情: So I am very petite, so I was worried that I would have an issue fitting into this. With mu h surprise, it only sits slightly wonky along my neck/shoulder area, but it's perfect for modeling!  The straps are excessively long. Prepare to cht them away

Not the greatest quality and the straps can be a bit awkward. Also does NOT match the initial image on the ad which had 2 straps across the chest but I looked at the reviews before hand and it matches those.
Not as vibrant as the picture more like a pail green
Cute enough.

I've had my eye on this sleeve for YEARS and I finally had the opportunity to get it and I am in love with it! If it's important to anyone- This is not interchangeable. It's only meant for the right side, unless you don't mind the clasp being in the back. 10/10 love the hell out of this!

Loved this piece paired with cargo pants
The green is very pale not neon. Very bad decision on my part. I expect green green for a costume this is not a good green for anything. Very ugly.

The buckle had no grip so it kept slipping, the material felt so cheep and it showed. Honestly your better off keeping your money tben buying this it was a total hot mess. The only thing I can say good about it thay it didn’t fall apart
